Title: Relates to the expiration and repeal of regulations limiting the engines of school vehicles to remain idling while parked or standing on school grounds
Summary: Relates to the expiration and repeal of regulations limiting the engines of school vehicles to remain idling while parked or standing on school grounds.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 670 of the laws of 2007 amending the education law relating to directing the commissioner of education to promulgate regulations limiting the engines of school vehicles to remain idling while parked or standing on school grounds, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
